mapper.insert: insert into t_order_out_log (id, wayBillNo, approveResult, approveComment, createTime) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{waybillno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approveresult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approvecomment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select * from t_order_out_log where waybillno = #{waybillno} order by createTime desc limit 0,1
